entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:29 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h. High minus 33. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 31 by morning. POP 60%
